scripts.patch:js-deep-patch: cd packages/js-deep-patch && npm version patch && cd ../.. && nx build js-deep-patch && cd dist/packages/js-deep-patch && npm publish
scripts.release:js-deep-patch: npm run verify:js-deep-patch && npm run patch:js-deep-patch
scripts.patch:rxjs-state-store: cd packages/rxjs-state-store && npm version patch && cd ../..
scripts.publish:rxjs-state-store: nx build rxjs-state-store && cd dist/packages/rxjs-state-store && npm publish
scripts.release:rxjs-state-store: npm run verify:rxjs-state-store && npm run patch:rxjs-state-store && npm run publish:rxjs-state-store
